Chicken Description.value: The Sin City features tender marinated grilled or crispy chickent topped with fried egg, applewood smoked bacon, American cheese, grilled onions, haystack onions, and our Smash sauce on an egg bun.

About This Location.value: The Caesars Palace Smashburger restaurant is located in the heart of the Las Vegas Strip inside Caesars Palace.  Smashburger is a part of the Forum Food Court, which is next to the Colosseum, Gordon Ramsay Pub & Grill, and the Forum Shops.  Coming from I-15, exit on Flamingo Road.  Caesars Palace is located at the intersection of Flamingo Road and Las Vegas Blvd. Guest Parking is available in a multi-level parking garage located on Jay Sarno Way behind Caesars Palace off of Industrial Road/Frank Sinatra Drive.  Caesars Palace also has a lot of valet options available to guests, which are located at any main entrance to the hotel and casino.
